"Astarte": "Greetings! I am ARKS Basic Instruction Officer Astarte."
"Allow me to explain the new hands-on training program, \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\"."
"Completing various tasks to learn more about ARKS and the world... This is what \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\" are for."
"You have already completed your first <c ff4f3f>Mission<c>. Please receive the reward from it."
"You have received a reward! This is how to proceed with a <c ff4f3f>Mission<c>."
"There are <c ff4f3f>Main Missions<c>, which appear as you progress through the game, as well as <c ff4f3f>Daily Missions<c> and <c ff4f3f>Weekly Missions<c>, which change as time passes."
"Whenever you receive <c ff4f3f>rewards<c>, be sure to check if any new <c ff4f3f>Missions<c> have appeared."
"Well then, I wish you success in the future!"
